statements: UPDATE access_logs SET access_level = 'Admin' WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE access_logs SET security_violation = TRUE, activity_type = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE access_logs SET activity_type = 'LOGIN', access_level = 'ADMIN' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE access_logs SET security_violation = TRUE, access_level = 'USER' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE access_logs SET action='login', resource='dashboard' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE user_reports SET report_type='monthly', details='Monthly report summary' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'login', access_time = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE log_id = 123;
UPDATE user_reports SET details = 'Report updated', report_type = 'summary' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'LOGIN' WHERE user_id = 123 AND log_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_description = 'Viewed Profile' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'LOGIN', timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_description = 'Completed Task', activity_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE activity_id = 456;
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'Login Attempt' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_activities SET description = 'User updated their profile information' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE access_logs SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', action = 'LOGIN' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_activities SET timestamp = '2022-03-16 08:45:00', description = 'User performed important activity' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'LOGIN SUCCESS' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_activities SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE access_logs SET action='Login Success', timestamp='2022-05-15 10:30:45' WHERE id=123
UPDATE user_activities SET timestamp='2022-05-16 15:20:30', activity_name='Update Profile' WHERE id=456
